website_summaries.verdict: A good piece of checked luggage for a short trip.
cons: Does not include a built in TSA lock

customer_reviews.title: I love this luggage
customer_reviews.text: I love this luggage. It is light, organized, and the "pack-more" system is really well designed and gives at least another couple of inches of storage. There are very few 24-inch suitcases and being a bit smaller makes a difference with international travel and managing luggage in airports, trains, etc. I wish I could pack light enough for a 21-inch for long trips but my toiletries and shoes, and tech stuff would fill a 21-inch and there would be no room for clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O

customer_reviews.title: and the fabric held up beautifully. In only one airport did it wiggle over ...
customer_reviews.text: The suitcase proved to be everything promised- lightweight, could tackle any surface from an upright position, and the fabric held up beautifully. In only one airport did it wiggle over some floor grids.
customer_reviews.author: L. Browning-Towns

customer_reviews.title: Travel with ease
customer_reviews.text: Since my purchase have used this twice. Wow. It literally almost glides on its own. A sturdy piece of luggage; yet light weight. The interior organization is great. This was more than I wanted to spend, but this bag has made travel a dream. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: DOOPED

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it as a replacement for a bag 20 years old. Features are great, rolls good, holds up to beatings by the airlines. She has been on several trips with it around the US and a couple to Japan. Still looks brand new. Wife said it is great and we need to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: KevinR

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, yet sturdy, functional, and very easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid construction for such a lightweight check-in suitcase. I've already traveled with this several times and it held enough clothes for a two-week trip, was easy to glide through the airport, and seems sturdy and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: B. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Victorinox Werks Traveler 5.0 👍
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Victorinox roller bag. I like the light weight and attention to detail of this luggage . It provides at least 15-20% more packing capacity than my previous bag. The wheel design makes it easy to roll on both hard flooring and low pile carpet. The handle design is very solid and does not have annoying instability when fully extended. I would buy this roller board again.
customer_reviews.author: Barry R. Gurley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Five Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great. Very good quality and lightweight. Great flexibility and love the spinner wheels. The bag feels very well constructed and the wheels are great, it rolls so smoothly and with very little effort. It even does well when moving it over asphalt or brick sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by a frequent world traveler
customer_reviews.text: Just bought my second- after the first suffered a fatal rip after many many voyages to low income countries for work. Lasted longe than any other bag that I have had- it is lightwieght and has convenient rollers and handle system as an extra. The wondered about the blue color at first but came to love it- no to bright but clearly different than the million black bags on the carousel.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Gear
customer_reviews.text: This luggage piece worked out great. We had to walk a few miles after taking a plane and Metro in Paris and the wheels did great, even on the terrible cobblestones. Really made the trip easier.
customer_reviews.author: natasha foulks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for traveling over a week
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, durable and functional. The 5-yr warranty is nice to have and the blue color differentiates it from other bags. Slick partitioning feature and very usable suiter Large cube zipper bags complement the system perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: CheapSeats

customer_reviews.title: A great travel bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the divider. It makes it easy to isolate things like shoes, and laundry from the rest of you clean cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Tool Person

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th. Victorinox Luggage! I think it's the best luggage available for frequent travellers! The wheels are easy to move even on uneven grounds. Great size too. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Indra Suharjono

customer_reviews.title: Good suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Positives: Good size, good value, warranty. Met my needs. Negatives: Expansion is very minimal, Suitcase itself is still 9lbs by itself. I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing suitcase. You can get clothes, shoes, miscellaneous accessories. It is easy to push on flooring and a little more difficult on carpet, but not bad and that is with my briefcase on top of it. What a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Durable... Takes a beating use after use, year after year.
customer_reviews.text: Have had Victorinox luggage in the past. Very durable... they take a beating and still look good after many years of use. Needed to purchase an additional piece... and this was it. Can’t beat it, especially for the price we got this time around.
customer_reviews.author: StanF

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: Got this bag for my 90 year old father. He loves it - it is light wight, rolls easily. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Ann H.

customer_reviews.title: Great travel suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Great spinner. Good size and packability for a trip of a week or so. Lightweight - seems to be about 40 lbs when packed so no worries with the weight limits. Nice exterior pockets. Seems durable after first 3 or so trips.
customer_reviews.author: KimmyM

customer_reviews.title: Luggage shipped was dirty and scuffed
customer_reviews.text: This was just delivered and the wheels are completely dirty and the front of the luggage is dirty and scrapped up. This was definitely not new
customer_reviews.author: Claudia L.

customer_reviews.title: but it is off to a good start. The zippers are sturdy and the wheel ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased and used once, but it is off to a good start. The zippers are sturdy and the wheel construction is much better (rolling is easier and smoother) than the Delsey I had been using for the past few years.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Caswell

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable suitcase
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase is high quality, durable and roomy. Love the four wheels making it a breeze to use in the airport. I bought the 27 and 24 suitcases and both are fabulous. I'd highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nearly perfect in size and configuration for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Very nearly perfect in size and configuration for my needs. Its first trip with me was to China, four airports, 15 time zones, in seven days. It still looks new. I also own its little brother.
customer_reviews.author: John Haynes

customer_reviews.title: It expands It’s sleek It glides great! I love victorinox and will most likely return ...
customer_reviews.text: Re writing the review because amazon app it unreliable...... wrote a long review. Here is the short version Cons After 2 weeks in Europe and 3 flights the seems at the corner by the wheels are frayed and becoming undone. It’s a manufacture defect not an airline issue. The bag tipped occasionally My con.... it fits too much so I overpacked Pros It carries a lot of stuff!! It expands It’s sleek It glides great! I love victorinox and will most likely return this for the spectra medium.
customer_reviews.author: CPNY

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 trip made but so far so good. Upgraded from a 3
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 trip made but so far so good. Upgraded from a 3.0 version. The only thing I don't like is the main compartment is a bit smaller in height so I can't store my 22" suitcase (also 3.0 version) inside anymore.
customer_reviews.author: DWhite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for short trips and very easy to handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Well made and lots of room. Easy to handle and wheels go in all directions. Special removable compartments that keep things separated. For me this is a perfect size for business and pleasure trips.
customer_reviews.author: WSW

customer_reviews.title: This suitcase was perfect, used it in nyc then to paris
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase was perfect, used it in nyc then to paris, france... Was lightweight, the wheels were perfect and pushing or pulling the suitcase was effortless
customer_reviews.author: Seth Drutz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, ultra smooth traveling suitcase. I feel like a millionaire every time I use it. Extra nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite bag
customer_reviews.text: Love all my Victorinox travel gear but this one is super nice.
customer_reviews.author: E. Santikos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent !
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great. Well constructed yet leightweight, replacng an older Victorinox which had endured countless overseas trips. Great flexibility and love the spinner wheels.
customer_reviews.author: HFF

customer_reviews.title: I had to order the product to find out the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to order the product to find out the REAL dimensions of this bag. It says 24" height, but the description should actually be 25.5" 24" packing, plus 1.5" wheels There is no room for error on luggage. 99 of 100 times. Airlines don't make exceptions on carry on bags
customer_reviews.author: Maureen C.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty design
customer_reviews.text: After only my second flight, wire ribbing was torn out by baggage handlers
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: Light, sturdy bag great for international travel.  Victorinox stands behind their warranty
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bag for awhile and used it for 8 or 10 international trips. It is a sturdy bag, light, maneuvers easily through airports. On one trip one of the wheels came off probably from airline abuse. I called the company and found there was a repair shop recommended. They also offered to send me a replacement wheel with instructions if I wanted to fix it myself. They sent it promptly and it was very easy to install. Never a problem since. Victorinox stands behind their warranty. I subsequently purchased the 20 inch werks, tote and large soft sided bags. All have been great!
customer_reviews.author: Sam t.

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage
customer_reviews.text: Recently used for international travel. Excellent! No problems. Rolled smoothly. Great.
customer_reviews.author: CAHuss

customer_reviews.title: Great Suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed , mobile and lightweight suitcase with lots of exterior/interior storage areas.. appears to be very well made and attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once to travel to Europe. I'm a big fan of Victorinox so my expectations were high, and they were met.
customer_reviews.author: G. R. Gattie

customer_reviews.title: Much better then any other brand I have tried
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase rolls very well. Much better then any other brand I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Victorinox Werks Traveler 5.0 WT Softside Spinner Luggage, Navy Blue, Checked-Medium (24")
product_meta.description: Size:Checked-Medium (24")| Color:Navy BlueThe ideal checked luggage size for a weeklong trip, this upright features the intelligent Pack More System which consists of five packing solutions including the Pack More divider which allows you to pack clothing flat and wrinkle-free. U-shaped front pocket holds up to a 17" (43 cm) laptop. The intelligent Pack More System consists of five packing solutions resulting in 32 possible packing configurations. Pack More System includes the Pack More divider, X-shaped compression straps, a removable suiter, a 2” (5 cm) zippered expansion and a removable attach-a-bag strap. Pack More divider is adjustable in height and creates a flat packing surface for wrinkle-free transport of clothing. X-shaped compression straps secure and condense contents of bag. Removable attach-a-bag strap secures an additional bag to the front of the upright and holds up to 30 lbs (13.6 kg). Ribbed, Geluxe Comfort Grip dampens vibrations. ID tray slides into handle bezel for security and convenience. Rear skid plates protect the bag from abrasion. Lockable YKK Racquet Coil™ zippers. Travel Sentry Approved combination lock secures belongings and allows U.S. airport security screeners to open the lock without destroying it and relock it after inspection. Access™ Lock Combination Recovery Program allows you to register your lock combination on victorinox.com and recover it if it is ever forgotten.
feature_bullets: One-touch, dual-trolley aluminum handle system locks into three positions - 41 inch 104 cm, 39 inch 99 cm and 37 inch 94 cm - to accommodate travelers of various heights and allows for superior control and maneuverability through tight spaces and allows you to rest another bag on top of the upright for consolidated travel
Dual-casters deliver a smooth, stable, quiet roll and provide 360 degree movement with zero weight-in-hand
9.06 pounds, 4968 cubic inches , Capacity - 81 litres and wheels are dual-casters

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars50 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
